description:
Alternative to te for defining tensor product smooths
in a gam formula. Results in a construction in which the penalties are 
non-overlapping multiples of identity matrices (with some rows and columns zeroed). 
The construction, which is due to Fabian Scheipl (mgcv implementation, 2010), is analogous to Smoothing Spline ANOVA 
(Gu, 2002), but using low rank penalized regression spline marginals. The main advantage of this construction 
is that it is useable with gamm4 from package gamm4.
example_call: t2(..., k = NA, bs = "cr", m = NA, d = NA, by = NA, xt = NULL,
